channel.title: natural language processing – Gustavo on Software Development
channel.description: Notes from a disciplined software developer

item.title: Announcing Booleano
item.dc:creator: Gustavo
item.description: I am proud to announce the first alpha release of Booleano, a Python-based interpreter of boolean expressions: Booleano is an interpreter of boolean expressions, a library to define and run filters available as text (e.g., in a natural language) or in Python code. In order to handle text-based filters, Booleano ships with a fully-featured parser... Continue reading →
